Package service

Class ServiceCallout

java.lang.Object
service.ServiceCallout
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddBody, AddHeader, BasicCalloutServer, JwtAuth, Redirect
public class ServiceCallout extends Object
ServiceCallout provides a base class for handling HTTP request and response processing in a gRPC-based service callout server. It processes incoming requests and modifies headers, bodies, or immediate responses as per the service logic.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServiceCallout

      protected ServiceCallout(ServiceCallout.Builder<?> builder)

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start() throws IOException
      Starts the gRPC server that handles processing requests from Envoy. Depending on the provided SSL configuration, the server will start in either secure or insecure mode.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while starting the server.

    • blockUntilShutdown

      public void blockUntilShutdown() throws InterruptedException
      Blocks the main thread until the server is terminated. This is necessary because gRPC uses daemon threads by default.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If interrupted while waiting for the server to shut down.

    • processRequest

      public io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.ProcessingResponse processRequest(io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.ProcessingRequest request)
      Processes incoming ProcessingRequest and builds the corresponding ProcessingResponse. This method handles different types of requests (headers, body) and delegates to specific handlers for processing.
      Parameters:
      request - The request to be processed.
      Returns:
      The processed response.

    • onRequestHeaders

      public void onRequestHeaders(io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.ProcessingResponse.Builder processingResponseBuilder, io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.HttpHeaders headers)
      Handles incoming request headers and allows for modification or response generation.
      Parameters:
      processingResponseBuilder - The response builder for modifying the response.
      headers - The incoming HTTP request headers.

    • onResponseHeaders

      public void onResponseHeaders(io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.ProcessingResponse.Builder processingResponseBuilder, io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.HttpHeaders headers)
      Handles incoming response headers and allows for modification or response generation.
      Parameters:
      processingResponseBuilder - The response builder for modifying the response.
      headers - The incoming HTTP response headers.

    • onRequestBody

      public void onRequestBody(io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.ProcessingResponse.Builder processingResponseBuilder, io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.HttpBody body)
      Handles incoming request body and allows for modification or response generation.
      Parameters:
      processingResponseBuilder - The response builder for modifying the response.
      body - The incoming HTTP request body.

    • onResponseBody

      public void onResponseBody(io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.ProcessingResponse.Builder processingResponseBuilder, io.envoyproxy.envoy.service.ext_proc.v3.HttpBody body)
      Handles incoming response body and allows for modification or response generation.
      Parameters:
      processingResponseBuilder - The response builder for modifying the response.
      body - The incoming HTTP response body.
